scenes.heading: INT. TEXAS STATE CAPITOL HEARING ROOM - DAY

dialogue.line: Chairman, distinguished members... Texas hemp already creates fifteen thousand jobs and generates half a billion in revenue. LIV HANA materializes as holographic display behind Jesse, charts appearing.
Jesse's testimony is supported by Texas Department of Agriculture data, cross-referenced withâ€”
Yes sir. Even AI can see Texas is losing tax revenue to Colorado.
We're not asking government to pick winners. We're asking government to get out of the way of Texas business.
Will the Lone Star State choose liberty... or let fear override facts? FREEZE FRAME on Jesse's determined face. TITLE CARD: "HIGH NOON CARTOON"
